11  void SuperCBS::addServer(Server *s)
12  {
13  DBGENTER(_SERVER_DBG_LEV);
14  servers[s] = counter;
15  counter++;
16  Tick cc=s->getBudget();
17  Tick pp=s->getPeriod();
18  Tick dd=s->getPeriod();
19  DBGVAR(cc); DBGVAR(pp);
20  period.push_back(pp);
21  wcet.push_back(cc);
22  U.push_back(double(cc)/double(pp));
23  }

28  last_change_time(0),
29  servers(),
30  period(),
31  wcet(),
32  U()

34  }

40  Tick SuperCBS::changeBudget(Server *s, Tick db)
41  {
42  DBGENTER(_SERVER_DBG_LEV);
43  Tick delta_budget = db;
44  //SporadicServer *s = (SporadicServer *)ss;
45  int index = servers[s];
46  double lambda;
47  DBGVAR(index);
48  DBGVAR(delta_budget);
49  DBGVAR(wcet.size());
50  DBGVAR(period.size());
51  if (delta_budget > 0) {
52  DBGPRINT("Positive part");
53  lambda = sensitivity(index);
54  DBGVAR(lambda);
55  if (double(delta_budget)/double(period[index]) <= lambda){
56  DBGPRINT("Less than or equal to lambda");
57  }
58  else{
59  DBGPRINT("Greater than lambda");
60  delta_budget = Tick::floor(lambda*double(period[index]));
61  }
62  }
63  else {
64  DBGPRINT("Negative part (<=0)");
65  }
66  wcet[index] += delta_budget;
67  if (wcet[index] < 1) wcet[index] = 1;
68  DBGVAR(wcet[index]);
69  U[index] = (double)wcet[index]/double(period[index]);
70  DBGVAR(U[index]);
71 
72  DBGVAR(last_change_time);
73 
74  if (last_change_time <= SIMUL.getTime()) {
75  last_change_time = s->changeBudget(delta_budget + s->getBudget());
76  DBGPRINT_2("in the past, new change time at ", last_change_time);
77  }
78  else {
79  DBGPRINT("in the future");
80  if (delta_budget < 0) {
81  last_change_time =
82  max(last_change_time, s->changeBudget(delta_budget + s->getBudget()));
83  DBGPRINT_2("delta_budget < 0, new change time at ", last_change_time);
84  }
85  else if (delta_budget > 0) {
86  ChangeBudgetEvt *e = new ChangeBudgetEvt(this, s, delta_budget + s->getBudget());
87  e->post(last_change_time, true);
88  DBGPRINT_2("delta_budget > 0, new change time at ", last_change_time);
89  }
90  }
91 
92  return delta_budget;
93  }
94 
95  void SuperCBS::onChangeBudget(ChangeBudgetEvt *e)
96  {
97  DBGPRINT("SuperCBS::onChangeBudget(ChangeBudgetEvt *e)");
98  Server *ss = e->getServer();
99  ss->changeBudget(e->getBudget());
100  }

105  // Tick SchedPoint::sensitivity(const constraints
106  // &exactConstraints, const row_t &U, int task){
107 
108  double SuperCBS::sensitivity(int task){
109 
110  // DBGENTER(_SERVER_DBG_LEV);
111  int nTask=U.size();
112  double lambda;
113  double suma=0;
114  DBGPRINT("Sensitivity");
115  DBGVAR(nTask);
116  DBGVAR(task);
117  DBGPRINT("utilization vector");
118  DBGVECTOR(U);
119  DBGPRINT("wcet");
120  DBGVECTOR(wcet);
121  DBGPRINT("period");
122  DBGVECTOR(period);
123  for (int i=0;i<nTask;i++)
124  suma += U[i];
125  lambda=(1-suma);
126  return (lambda);
127  }
